casebody.data:
Anthony BUTLER
v.
SCOTLAND COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION No. 75P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Mr. Thomas M. Van Camp, Pinehurst, Attorney at Law, for Butler, Anthony Mr. Nickolas J. Sojka, Jr., Laurinburg, Attorney at Law Ms. Amanda Tomblyn, for Butler, Anthony Mr. Kenneth A. Soo, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Scotland County Board of Education Ms. Jill R. Wilson, Greensboro, Attorney at Law Ms. Elizabeth Troutman, Greensboro, Attorney at Law Ms. Lindsey Vance Smith, Attorney at Law, for Scotland County Board of Education

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of March 2018 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
